name: Xal'thuun
title: Dream-Seeker
abilityWindow: When any player activates a non-home, non-fracture system other than Mecatol Rex that contains their units:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to treat one non-home system that contains their units as adjacent to the active system for this tactical action.

name: Thul'morah
title: The Awakened One
abilityWindow: When you vote on an agenda:
abilityText: Add votes equal to the number of planets in systems that contain nexus tokens.
unlockCondition: Have all 3 of your nexus tokens on the game board.

name: Shuulgoroth
title: The Nightmare Made Flesh
abilityText: Place or move up to 3 of your nexus tokens into any non-home system other than the Mecatol Rex system. Then, you may place your flagship in any system that contains a planet you control. If that system contains another player's ships, you must resolve combat. Then, purge this card.

name: Shardwright Veyla
title: Fleet Control
abilityWindow: At the end of a player's turn:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to place a number of fighters from their reinforcements in the active system up to the number of non-fighter ships in that system. If that player was another player, gain trade goods equal to half of the amount of fighters placed rounded down.

name: Highbearer Lumina
title: Lightkeeper
abilityWindow: When you activate a system that contains another player's ships:
abilityText: Your ships with capacity gain +1 to their capacity value until the end of that tactical action.
unlockCondition: Have 3 ships with a printed capacity value in the same system at the end of a tactical action.

name: Facet
title: Hive Mind Nexus
abilityWindow: At the start of a space combat:
abilityText: Place non-fighter ships in the active system from your reinforcements equal to the amount and type of each of your opponent's non-fighter ships participating in this combat. Your ships in the active system do not count against your fleet limit. At the end of combat, purge this card.

name: Orrun
title: Ash-Tender
abilityWindow: After a player's ship is destroyed during combat:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to place the destroyed unit in any system that contains at least 1 of their ships and their command token.

name: Karos
title: Ember-Guide
abilityWindow: When you gain or research a unit upgrade technology:
abilityText: Place 1 of the corresponding unit from your reinforcements in into a system that contains a planet you control and no other player's ships. Each time you use one of your unit's BOMBARDMENT abilities; For each hit, you may either gain 1 commodity, or convert 1 commodity to a trade good.
unlockCondition: Use your Beauty in Destruction faction ability.

name: Asera
title: Flame-Warden
abilityText: Choose a system that contains 1 or more of your ships. Use each of your unit's BOMBARDMENT abilities in that system against each planet controlled by other players in or adjacent to that system. Then, purge this card.

name: Shipwright Kastel
title: Master of Defense
abilityWindow: When a non-combat game effect would instruct a player to remove or destroy one of their units:
abilityText: You may instead exhaust this card to allow that player to ignore that effect.

name: Captain Vakros
title: Fleetmaster
abilityText: You may reroll 1 of your mechs combat die per round.
unlockCondition: Win a combat in which one of your mechs participated.

name: Admiral Thalen
title: Ironborn
abilityWindow: After moving at least 1 mech and no ships into the active system:
abilityText: Immediately commit all mechs to any planets in the active system, resolve ground combat if able. Then, purge this card.

name: Len
title: Appraiser
abilityWindow: When a player exhausts a planet to vote on an agenda:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to double that planet's influence value.

name: Zul
title: Grand Architect
abilityText: Gain 1 trade good. If the explored planet has a Design attached to it, gain 1 additional trade good.

name: Zat
title: Architect Savant
abilityText: Take the Grand Design and attach it to a planet in your home system. Then, explore each planet with a Design attached to it and ready that planet. Then, purge this card.

name: Overclock
title: Production Specialist
abilityWindow: When any player's unit uses its PRODUCTION ability:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to choose 1 non-home, non-legendary planet with no attachments adjacent to one of their planets that is controlled by another player. They may use its resource value as if they controlled it for this use of PRODUCTION.

name: Seize
title: Sabateur
abilityWindow: When you are not the active player:
abilityText: During Space Cannon Offense, you may use 1 compromised PDS as if you controlled it.
unlockCondition: Have 3 compromised units on the game board.

name: Revolution
title: The People's Voice
abilityText: Destroy up to 3 compromised structures and move their compromised tokens to any other structures owned by the same player. If you do, place 1 infantry on the destroyed structures planet, resolving ground combat if necessary. Then, purge this card.
